thread.title: This is the skincare brand Vanessa Hudgens uses to get radiant skin
thread.title_full: This is the skincare brand Vanessa Hudgens uses to get radiant skin

author: Claire Beaudreault
title: This is the skincare brand Vanessa Hudgens uses to get radiant skin
text:
This is the skincare brand Vanessa Hudgens uses to get radiant skin Vanessa Hudgens just shared the secret to her beautiful radiant skin , and it’s Kate Somerville Skincare.
The star posted a car selfie of her seemingly makeup-free face , puckering up for her 23 million Instagram followers. Her strong brows and tousled hair make for a cute and casual look. We’re into that understated choker she’s rocking, too. (Oh, and the seatbelt. Safety is always sexy.)
The LA-based skincare brand reposted Vanessa’s photo on their Instagram , and it seems like the adoration is mutual. “Just look at that glow,” the caption reads.
Kate Somerville’s Instagram bio reads, “Whatever your skin concern, Kate can visibly change your skin and this can change your life.” It seems to have worked for Vanessa!
Who needs makeup when your skin looks this good? Love @katesomervilleskincare for keeping my skin on point ❤❤ 
A photo posted by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Jan 15, 2017 at 9:52pm PST 
This collection of “cult favorites” is a good place to start with sampling Kate Somerville’s products. #SkincareSunday @sydnesummer . . #WinTheWarOnWrinkles #KateCan #WrinkleWarrior #katesomerville 
A photo posted by Kate Somerville Skincare (@katesomervilleskincare) on Jan 15, 2017 at 9:10am PST 
Not that the youthful Vanessa needs it (supposedly it’s never too early to start), but the 2-in-1 moisturizer and serum combo Wrinkle Warrior ($95) is one of Kate Somerville’s best-loved and best-selling products.
Pump, plump, glide~ #WrinkleWarrior #WinTheWarOnWrinkles #KateCan #katesomerville 
A video posted by Kate Somerville Skincare (@katesomervilleskincare) on Jan 14, 2017 at 12:43pm PST 
The EradiKate acne treatment ($26) is another of the most popular products from the line. Kate Somerville The Nourish moisturizer ($65) improves skin texture and elasticity and is good for daily use on sensitive skin. Kate Somerville Vanessa’s not the only gorgeous actress who swears by the brand. Anna Kendrick prepped her skin for the Golden Globes with products from the line.
…And the award for Most Gorgeous Globes Glow goes to our girl @annakendrick47! #glowingonmelrose #goldenglobesbeauty #annakendrick #katesomerville 
A photo posted by Kate Somerville Skincare (@katesomervilleskincare) on Jan 8, 2017 at 8:07pm PST 
A peek into the Kate Somerville clinic in LA, where the slogan is “#glowingonmelrose.” Pampering with @chrisellelim & the @cincteam at the clinic today! ✨ #glowingonmelrose #katesomerville 
A photo posted by Kate Somerville Skincare (@katesomervilleskincare) on Jan 10, 2017 at 12:58pm PST 
We just might treat ourselves to a few Kate Somerville products if our skin can look as radiant as Vanessa’s! You can take a gander online at katesomerville.com !
